00027 data_t::data_t(digit_t initial1, digit_t initial2, digit_t initial3) {
00028     mLength=1;
00029     mAllocated=QuickDigits::count;
00030     digits=mQuickDigits;
00031     digits[0]=initial1;
00032     digits[1]=initial2;
00033     digits[2]=initial3;
00034     mCopies=0;
00035     mIsNegative=false;
00036 }
00037 
00039 data_t::data_t(data_t *c) {
00040     mLength=c->mLength;
00041     if (c->digits == c->mQuickDigits) {
00042         digits=mQuickDigits;
00043         mAllocated=QuickDigits::count;
00044     } else {
00045         try {
00046             mAllocated=mLength;
00047             #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00048                 digits=new digit_t[mAllocated];
00049             #else
00050                 mStorage.resize(mAllocated, 0);
00051                 digits=&mStorage[0];
00052             #endif
00053         } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00054             throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00055         }
00056     }
00057     memcpy(digits, c->digits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00058 
00059     mCopies=0;
00060     mIsNegative=c->mIsNegative;
00061 }
00062 
00063 #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00064 data_t::~data_t() {
00065     zero(mQuickDigits, QuickDigits::count);
00066     if (digits != mQuickDigits) {
00067         zero(digits, mAllocated);
00068         delete[] digits;
00069     }
00070 }
00071 #endif
00072 
00077 void data_t::skipLeadingZeros() {
00078     digit_t *d=digits+mLength-1;
00079     while (d>digits && *d==0) --d;
00080     mLength=int((d-digits)+1);
00081     if (mLength==1 && digits[0]==0) mIsNegative=false; // Zero isn't negative
00082 }
00083 
00084 void data_t::quickset(digit_t d1, digit_t d2, digit_t d3) {
00085     assert(mCopies==1);
00086 
00087     mLength=3;
00088     digits[0]=d1;
00089     digits[1]=d2;
00090     digits[2]=d3;
00091     mIsNegative=false;
00092     skipLeadingZeros();
00093 }

00095 void data_t::alloc(size_t newcount, bool copydigits) {
00096     if (digits==mQuickDigits && newcount<=QuickDigits::count) {
00097         if (!copydigits) zero(digits, QuickDigits::count);
00098         else zero(digits+mLength, (newcount-mLength));
00099         mLength=newcount;
00100     } else if (newcount < mAllocated) {
00101         if (copydigits) {
00102             if (newcount>mLength) zero(digits+mLength, newcount-mLength);
00103             mLength=newcount;
00104         } else {
00105             mLength=newcount;
00106             zero(digits, mLength);
00107         }
00108     } else {
00109         #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00110             int e=newcount;
00111             newcount=1;
00112             while (newcount < e) newcount <<= 1;
00113         #endif
00114 
00115         if (digits==mQuickDigits && copydigits) {
00116             try {
00117                 #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00118                     digits=new digit_t[newcount];
00119                 #else
00120                     mStorage.resize(newcount);
00121                     digits=&mStorage[0];
00122                 #endif
00123             } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00124                 digits=mQuickDigits; // Might allow for recovery in some cases
00125                 throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00126             }
00127 
00128             memcpy(digits, mQuickDigits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00129             zero(digits+mLength, newcount-mLength);
00130         } else {
00131             #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00132                 digit_t *newDigits=0;
00133                 try {
00134                     newDigits=new digit_t[newcount];
00135                 } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00136                     throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00137                 }
00138 
00139                 if (copydigits) {
00140                     memcpy(newDigits, digits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00141                     zero(newDigits+mLength, newcount-mLength);
00142                 } else zero(newDigits, newcount);
00143 
00144                 if (digits!=mQuickDigits) {
00145                     zero(digits, mAllocated);
00146                     delete[] digits;
00147                 }
00148                 digits=newDigits;
00149             #else
00150                 try {
00151                     mStorage.resize(newcount);
00152                 } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00153                     throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00154                 }
00155                 digits=&mStorage[0];
00156                 if (!copydigits) zero(digits, newcount);
00157             #endif
00158         }
00159         mLength=mAllocated=newcount;
00160     }
00161 }

00163 void data_t::copy(const data_t *c, size_t extraDigits) {
00164     alloc(c->mLength+extraDigits);
00165 
00166     mLength=c->mLength;
00167     if (c->mLength==1) *digits = *c->digits;
00168     else memcpy(digits, c->digits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00169 
00170     mIsNegative=c->mIsNegative;
00171 
00172     // Deliberately doesn't call skipLeadingZeros().
00173 }
00174 
00175 void data_t::zero(digit_t *p, size_t count) {
00176     digit_t *pe=p+count;
00177     while (p<pe) *p++=0;
00178 }

00180 void data_t::invert() {
00181     assert(mCopies==1);
00182 
00183     mIsNegative=!mIsNegative;
00184 
00185     digit_t *d=digits, *e=d+mLength;
00186     while (d<e) {
00187         *d=static_cast<digit_t>(digit_overflowbit - 1 - *d);
00188         ++d;
00189     }
00190 
00191     d=digits;
00192     while (d<e) {
00193         doubledigit_t w=(*d)+1;
00194         (*d++)=static_cast<digit_t>(w);
00195         if (w<digit_overflowbit) break;
00196     }
00197 
00198     skipLeadingZeros();
00199 }
00200 
00201 void data_t::negate() {
00202     assert(mCopies==1);
00203 
00204     // If it's zero, don't change the sign
00205     if (mLength>1 || digits[0]!=0) mIsNegative=!mIsNegative;
00206 }
00207 
00208 void data_t::add(const data_t& addend) {
00209     assert(mCopies==1);
00210     assert(mLength >= addend.mLength);
00211 
00212     // The answer to any addition problem contains, at most, one digit more
00213     // than the largest addend.
00214     realloc(mLength+1);
00215 
00216     // Now add the digits, starting at the least-significant digit.
00217     digit_t carry=0;
00218     size_t x=0;
00219     for (; x<addend.mLength; ++x) {
00220         doubledigit_t t=doubledigit_t(digits[x])+addend.digits[x]+carry;
00221         if (t>=digit_overflowbit) { carry=1; t-=digit_overflowbit; } else carry=0;
00222         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00223     }
00224 
00225     while (carry) {
00226         doubledigit_t t=doubledigit_t(digits[x])+1;
00227         if (t>=digit_overflowbit) { carry=1; t-=digit_overflowbit; } else carry=0;
00228         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00229         ++x;
00230     }
00231 
00232     skipLeadingZeros();
00233 }
00234 
00235 void data_t::subtract(const data_t& subtrahend) {
00236     assert(mCopies==1);
00237     assert(mLength >= subtrahend.mLength);
00238 
00239     // For subtraction, the answer will always be less than or equal to the
00240     // size of the longest operand, so we've already got enough room.
00241 
00242     // Now subtract the digits, starting at the least-significant one.
00243     size_t x;
00244     int borrow=0;
00245     doubledigit_t t;
00246     for (x=0; x<subtrahend.mLength; ++x) {
00247         t=(digits[x]+digit_overflowbit)-subtrahend.digits[x]-borrow;
00248         if (t<digit_overflowbit) borrow=1; else { borrow=0; t-=digit_overflowbit; }
00249         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00250     }
00251 
00252     for (; x<mLength && borrow; ++x) {
00253         t=(digits[x]+digit_overflowbit)-borrow;
00254         if (t<digit_overflowbit) borrow=1; else { borrow=0; t-=digit_overflowbit; }
00255         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00256     }
00257 
00258     if (borrow) negate();
00259     skipLeadingZeros();
00260 }
00261 
00262 void data_t::shift_left(size_t byBits) {
00263     assert(mCopies==1);
00264     assert(byBits>0);
00265 
00266     size_t bytes=byBits / bits_per_digit, bits=byBits % bits_per_digit;
00267     size_t oldLength=mLength;
00268 
00269     realloc(mLength+bytes+1);
00270 
00271     if (bits != 0) {
00272         // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00273         digit_t *s=digits+oldLength-1, *t=s+bytes+1;
00274 
00275         *t-- = *s >> (bits_per_digit - bits);
00276         while (s > digits) {
00277             *t = (*s-- << bits);
00278             *t-- |= (*s >> (bits_per_digit - bits));
00279         }
00280         *t = (*s << bits);
00281 
00282         if (bytes != 0) memset(digits, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00283     } else if (bytes != 0) {
00284         memmove(digits+bytes, digits, sizeof(digit_t) * oldLength);
00285         memset(digits, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00286     }
00287     skipLeadingZeros();
00288 }
00289 
00290 void data_t::shift_right(size_t byBits) {
00291     assert(mCopies==1);
00292     assert(byBits>0);
00293 
00294     size_t bytes=byBits / bits_per_digit, bits=byBits % bits_per_digit,
00295         bits2 = bits_per_digit - bits;
00296 
00297     if (bytes >= mLength) {
00298         // Right-shift it into oblivion.
00299         mLength=1;
00300         *digits=0;
00301     } else if (bits != 0) {
00302         // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00303         digit_t *t=digits, *s=digits+bytes, *se=digits+mLength-1;
00304         while (s!=se) {
00305             *t = (*s++ >> bits);
00306             *t++ |= (*s << bits2);
00307         }
00308         *t = (*s >> bits);
00309         if (bytes != 0) {
00310             memset(digits+mLength-bytes, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00311             mLength-=bytes;
00312         }
00313         skipLeadingZeros();
00314     } else if (bytes != 0) {
00315         memmove(digits, digits + bytes, sizeof(digit_t) * (mLength - bytes));
00316         memset(digits + mLength - bytes, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00317         mLength-=bytes;
00318         skipLeadingZeros();
00319     }
00320 }
